#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(){
        int n;
        cin>>n;
        int ct=0;
        int k=n;
        while(n!=0){
        n=n/2;    
            ct++;
        }
        int a[ct];
        int i=0;
        n=k;
        //System.out.println(ct);
        while(n!=0){
            a[i]=n%2;
            n=n/2;
            i++;
            
        }
      int ft=0;  
        for(i=0;i<ct;i++){
            if(a[i]==1){
                ft++;
            }
        }
        
        
        cout<<ft;
        
    }
